data.name: CRM_Email_address
data.value: Swiss Academic Software GmbH - Florhofstrasse 2 - 8820 Waedenswil - Switzerland

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionInfoMail_first_paragraph
data.value: The site license that you purchased for your employees and students has been renewed. All Citavi users will receive an email informing them of the next steps to take.

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionInfoMail_second_paragraph
data.value: Citavi 6 users have to confirm that they are still members of your organization. Depending on your chosen settings, this can be accomplished by (a) clicking the confirmation link in the email; (b) logging in to Shibboleth; (c) entering a voucher code. No license information is copied and then entered in Citavi. ##newline Citavi 5 users have to log in to their Citavi accounts. There, the license key can be found and must be copied to the Clipboard. It can then be entered in Citavi 5. Users can also request license keys for earlier versions of Citavi. Please see ##helpgetoldversion for more information.

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionInfoMail_subject
data.value: Information for administrators: Your Citavi site license was renewed

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLicensfileExportData_button
data.value: Learn more in the Citavi Manual

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLicensfileExportData_first_paragraph
data.value: Your university is using a site license for Citavi. To create a settings file, which among other things can include login credentials to restricted databases, you need a special license key file. Attached you will find this special license key file.

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLicensfileExportData_second_paragraph
data.value: To learn more about creating settings files, please see the Citavi Manual.

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLicensfileExportData_subject
data.value: License key for Citavi settings file export for ##organization

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtension_button
data.value: Log in to account now

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtension_first_paragraph
data.value:
Your university or organization recently renewed its site license. The new license key can now be found in your account. Log in to your account to verify that you are still affiliated with the university or organization.
Your license is valid for ##productname. Do you need a license for an earlier Citavi version? ##helpgetoldversion
##addOn

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtension_subject
data.value: The Citavi site license was renewed

data.name: CRM_Email_disclaimer
data.value: If you did not make this request, please ignore this message.

data.name: CRM_Email_regards_firstline
data.value: Best regards,

data.name: CRM_Email_regards_secondline
data.value: Your Citavi Team

data.name: CRM_Email_Salutation
data.value: Dear {0},

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLicensfilePublicInstall_button
data.value: Go to the manual

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLicensfilePublicInstall_first_paragraph
data.value: Your university currently has a site license for Citavi. To use Citavi on public computers, such as in a library or computer lab, you can use the attached license key file for ##productname to simplify deployment.

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLicensfilePublicInstall_second_paragraph
data.value: The Citavi Manual describes how to use the file.

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLicensfilePublicInstall_subject
data.value: Citavi License Key File for Public Workstations for ##organization

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLoginShibboleth_button
data.value: Log in to account

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLoginShibboleth_first_paragraph
data.value: Your university or organization recently renewed its site license. In September 2016 we changed how you can get your license information. The new license key can now be found in your account.

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLoginShibboleth_subject
data.value: Your Citavi site license has been renewed

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionVerifyAccount_button
data.value: Choose a password

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionVerifyAccount_first_paragraph
data.value: Your university or organization recently renewed its site license for Citavi. In September 2016 we changed our licensing procedure. You can now find your new license key in your Citavi account.

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionVerifyAccount_second_paragraph
data.value:
To complete your Citavi account registration, choose a password for logging in to your account. ##newline Your license is valid for ##productname. Do you need a license for an earlier Citavi version? ##helpgetoldversion
##addOn

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionVerifyAccount_subject
data.value: Your Citavi site license has been renewed

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionVerifyLicense_button
data.value: Log in to account

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionVerifyLicense_first_paragraph
data.value:
Your Citavi site license has been renewed. You can find the new license key in your Citavi account. Log in to access the license key. ##newline Your license is valid for ##productname. Do you need a license for an earlier Citavi version? ##helpgetoldversion
##addOn

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionVerifyLicense_subject
data.value: Your Citavi site license has been renewed

data.name: CRM_Email_CampusContractExtensionLoginShibboleth_second_paragraph
data.value:
If you don't have a Citavi Account yet, you can create one below. You'll be led through the process step by step. If you already have a Citavi Account, click the link to log in. ##newline Your license is valid for ##productname. Do you need a license for an earlier Citavi version? ##helpgetoldversion
##addOn
